LOGIN_WELCOME_DESC: Please sign-in to your account and start the adventure. This is a project for managing works and acquisitions in GRP. We aim to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity.
SIGN_UP_WELCOME_DESC: Please create an account and begin the adventure. This is a project to manage jobs and procurement in GRP. Our goal is to optimize your workflow and improve productivity from the very first step. Sign up now and take your management to the next level!
FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESC: Enter your email address and we will send you a new password via email.
